type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

address.LocationName: Full name of the location / facility
address.BuildingID: Building identifier - e.g. building number, building name…
address.ApartmentID: Apartment identifier - e.g. number, code, name…
address.CityName: If no CityCode provided, full name of the city
address.StateName: If no StateCode provided, full name of state / dept. / region / province / canton
address.CountryName: If no CountryCode provided, full country name
